sentence: Whereas when it comes to to gay rights, I mean, right now in Florida, we have the Dont Say Gay? issue, the law that is being passed by Ron DeSantis and the Republicans there.
title: Lifting the curtain on SCOTUS with a POLITICO reporter who broke the Roe story
